item.title: Fly tipping again.. several weeks and no action, 15th December
item.description:
Fly tipping in the usual spot behind Karv restaurant. Multiple household items dumped in the alleyway between Stellman close and Benthal road. Vacuum cleaner and bags of decaying rubbish dumped in the the plant beds behind Karv restaurant near the bins.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Benthal Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
